Unknown View on Unsplash.com Use the seekbar to set the preview quality.
Note: 1. Preview updates when you release seekbar. 
2. The higher the quality the slower your images will load in app. So try to keep a good balance between them based on your connectivity. Quality :

preview_quality_base_pref_key preview_quality_percent default_image_base_pref_key default_image_pref_key quick_set_wallpaper_base_pref quick_set_wallpaper_pref storage_preference_base_key storage_type_pref_key storage_custom_location_key storage_custom_location_uri_key
Information Button Click this to view quick access controls. Wallpaper Orientation This indicates the orientation of the respective wallpaper. Add to Muzei Press to add wallpaper to currently active Muzei list if available otherwise create list.
Long press to create or add to another muzei list. Grey Scale Use this to download/set the wallpaper in grayscale. Set Wallpaper Press to download and set image as wallpaper or long press this button to use "Set As" option.
Note: The Set As menu will appear after the image is downloaded. Download Use this to download and save Image on your storage and use it for anything.

Note : You can set a default format of image to download in settings.
Share Wol:Pepper Share Wol:Pepper with all the amazing humans you know Telegram Group Join our Google+ Community for latest update news and also help us build better apps. Send Feedback We love to hear from our users, send us whatever thoughts or suggestions you have about the app. Privacy Policy Our Privacy Policy explains how we use, share and protect information in relation to our mobile services and your choices about the collection and use of your information. Delete Account This will delete everything related to Wol:Pepper This will delete all your saved words from our database and delete everything related to your account. Are you sure about it? All wallpapers that you see in this application are from Unsplash.com.
Wolpepper uses API from Unsplash.com Glide Image Library Space Mono is an original fixed-width type family designed by Colophon Foundry for Google Design. It supports a Latin Extended glyph set, enabling typesetting for English and other Western European languages. Shahid Shaikh Eclectik Devs Team Android, Java Developer M.Junaid Gandhi Android Developer and Designer Wol:Pepper was created to set a standard in wallpaper application. Wol:Pepper follows a simple easy to use UI but never compromises on the quality of wallpapers.

Every wallpaper you see in this application are from Unsplash.com

Wolpepper allows you to have 2 versions of each wallpaper, either grayscale or colored. You can also rotate, flip and do many other things on them while setting them as wallpaper. You decide what you want.

Feel free to send your feedback to us, if you love the app make sure to rate this app it will really help us. Join our Google plus community to know more about our upcoming/existing projects and updates. 

Thank you!

Keep Peppering your walls. Because Quality Matters Wolpepper makes use of API from Unsplash.com. The app also adds many features including grey scaling images, muzei integration and many more.
Enjoy!
changelog_dialog_base_pref_key What's new Version 2.0.9.8: 

• Fixed Muzei Support. 

• Fixed Muzei Settings activity not launching from Muzei Sources screen. 

• Fixed crash on collection screen. 

• Code changes to adhere to Unsplash's updated guidelines. 

• Other minor tweaks and changes. EXAMPLE Add widget is_active_list_changed_pref
